name: Matt & Zoey - Dungeon Adventure
description:
Matt and Zoey appear in a dungeon, filled with dangerous traps.  Can Zoey save Matt from getting harmed? Only time can show.

Controls:
[WASD] or arrows to move
[Space] to MEOW
[Enter] to continue dialogue

Special Thanks To

Alex for making pixel art
Extra Credits for making inspirational videos
Pixel_Poem for a dungeon tileset
Blambot Comic Fonts for the pixel font
